item.title: Public Secure
item.description: Understanding establishing context 13 stakeholders were interviewed, which were all different program areas that have the potential to implement better single sign-on. 12 end users from the general public were interviewed. Stakeholders Key takeaways from analyzing the existing user flows: login frustrations stem from confusing onboarding processes & a lack of hierarchy in the presentation of information.

item.title: Collective
item.description: Problem Discovery finding a door to open To begin learning what questions to ask, we started by breaking down the challenge prompt: While we looked at other subspaces involving the inclusion of groups with disabilities, we eventually decided on exploring the barriers to inclusion for those with mental health disabilities. Investigation getting a foot in the door Although we were constrained by time and resources, we conducted 7 generative interviews.
